thread.section_title: CurrentBody.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.currentbody.com
thread.title: Alex Ser

author: Alex Ser
title: Alex Ser
text: Due to horrible dcd service, I received my parcel one week late and found open. I work everyday day and all day, for me was impossible to go and collect the order, which was expensive. I spend at list one hours per day trying to contact the company but was impossible to get the situation resolved. Thank to Natalie and Heather I could track the parcel and finally received my delivery. They were both brilliant and very helpful.
